content.rendered: One of my resolutions for 2014 is to get better at blogging my shoots. No more getting behind! Only slightly late, here some images from my recent session with Kurdish literature expert Dr Özlem Galip. We had an easy-going and chatty shoot in an alleyway in Daslton about a month ago.
